ui.profile.changePassword.label: Password
log.entry.unitCreated: Unit {triggeringUnit} has been created on the board
log.entry.unitMoved.sameRow: Unit {triggeringUnit} has moved to a different position in the same row
card.leaderVelElleron.name: Vel'Elleron
card.leaderVelElleron.title: The Battlemage
card.leaderVelElleron.description:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Steel Spark, An Encouragement, Fireball, Fiery Entrance
card.leaderVelRaminea.name: Vel'Raminea
card.leaderVelRaminea.title: The Flameweaver
card.leaderVelRaminea.description:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Spell 1, Spell 2, Spell 3, Spell 4
card.leaderNighterie.name: Nighterie
card.leaderNighterie.title: The Keeper of Shadows
card.leaderNighterie.description:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Shadow Spark, Nightmare Drain, Crystal Barrage, Army of Shadows
card.heroZamarath.name: Zamarath
card.heroZamarath.title: The Protector
card.heroKroLah.name: Kro'Lah
card.heroKroLah.title: The Sky Guardian
card.heroKroLah.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose an enemy row.
*Stun* and *Push 1* all units on that row.
card.heroCarienne.name: Carienne
card.heroCarienne.title: The Storm Unleashed
card.heroCarienne.description:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damagePerWave} Damage to all enemy units.
Repeat once for every *Gathering Storm* in your Graveyard.
card.heroUrvial.name: Urvial
card.heroUrvial.title: The Stormsmith
card.heroUrvial.description:
*Deploy:* Your *Storms* are upgraded until the end of the game.

Upgraded *Storms* may target the same unit multiple times.
card.heroGarellion.name: Garellion
card.heroGarellion.title: The Conduit
card.heroGarellion.description:
*Round End:*
*Consume* all remaining Mana.
Gain {powerPerMana} Power per Mana consumed.
card.heroAura.name: Aura
card.heroAura.title: The Golden Hawk
card.heroAura.description:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* a Legendary card from your deck.
card.heroArgenta.name: Argenta
card.heroArgenta.title: The Silver Falcon
card.heroArgenta.description:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* an Epic card from your deck.
card.heroAntoria.name: Antoria
card.heroAntoria.title: The Martyr
card.heroAntoria.description:
Whenever an ally takes damage while {name} is in your hand, redirect the damage to her.

If {name} is killed while in your hand, *Draw* a card.
card.heroAurienne.name: Aurienne
card.heroAurienne.title: The Shield of Faith
card.heroAurienne.description:
Whenever an allied unit takes lethal damage while {name} is in your hand, prevent it.
Then, move the ally back, *Play* {name} in it's place and *Draw* a card.
card.heroTroviar.name: Troviar
card.heroTroviar.title: The Torturer
card.heroTroviar.description:
*Deploy:* Deal {deployDamage} Damage to {targetCount} enemy units.

Whenever another unit takes damage, gain +{powerGained} Power.
card.heroMetrearte.name: Metrearte
card.heroMetrearte.title: The Copycat
card.heroMetrearte.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a Leader Power from any Arcane Leader.
Gain a copy of it.
card.heroPozoga.name: Pożoga
card.heroPozoga.title: The Arsonist
card.heroPozoga.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy all cards with the highest Power on the board.
card.heroSparklingSpirit.name: Sparkling Spirit
card.heroRagingElemental.name: Raging Elemental
card.heroRagingElemental.description:
After {name} takes damage, it deals Damage equal to own Power to closest opposing enemy units.

Then, it destroys itself.
card.heroStormDancer.name: Storm Dancer
card.heroStormDancer.description:
Whenever you cast a spell, give +{powerGiven} Power to adjacent units.
If it's a *Storm*, give them +{stormPowerGiven} Power instead.
card.heroCoralScribe.name: Coral Scribe
card.heroCoralScribe.description:
*Deploy:*
For each different *Storm* in your Graveyard, *Create* a copy of it.
card.heroFlameDancer.name: Flame Dancer
card.heroFlameDancer.description:
*Deploy:*
Apply *Burning* for {burnDuration} turns to all units on an enemy row.
card.heroRavenCaller.name: Raven Caller
card.heroLightOracle.name: Oracle of Light
card.heroLightOracle.description:
*Deploy:*
Look at top {cardsToSee} cards from your deck. Choose one to *Summon*.
card.heroDarkOracle.name: Oracle of Darkness
card.heroDarkOracle.description:
*Deploy:*
Look at bottom {cardsToSee} cards from your opponent's deck. Choose one to *Discard*.
card.heroCrystalWarrior.name: Crystal Warrior
card.heroCrystalWarrior.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied unit.
Then, summon a *Crystal* in its place.
card.heroCultistOfAreddon.name: Cultist of Areddon
card.heroCultistOfAreddon.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied unit.
Then, *Create* a copy of it.
card.heroAdventuringGuildMaster.name:
Adventuring
Guild Master
card.heroAdventuringGuildMaster.descript:
*Deploy:*
Gain +{powerPerCard} Power per other Unit played this turn.
card.heroForksmanshipInstructor.name: Forksmanship Instructor
card.heroForksmanshipInstructor.descript: Whenever you play a unit with {powerThreshold} Power or less, give it +{bonusPower} Power.
card.heroTribeShaman.name: Tribal Shaman
card.heroElderElemental.name: Elder Elemental
card.heroElderElemental.description:
*Deploy:* Generate {manaGenerated} Mana.

*Turn Start:* Repeat this unit's *Deploy* effect.
card.unitRavenMessenger.name: Raven Messenger
card.unitRavenMessenger.description:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* a Bronze Human card from your deck.
card.unitForestScout.name: Forest Scout
card.unitForestScout.description:
*Deploy:*
If you're losing on the board, gains {boardPowerBonus} Power.
If you're losing on Morale, gains {moralePowerBonus} Power.
card.unitChargingKnight.name: Charging Knight
card.unitChargingKnight.description:
Perform an *Attack Action* whenever it moves forward

*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage
card.unitVampireFledgling.name: Vampire Fledgling
card.unitVampireFledgling.description:
Loses {powerLost} Power per turn.

*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage. If damage is not blocked, then Restore {powerDrained} Power
card.unitPriestessOfAedine.name: Priestess of Aedine
card.unitPriestessOfAedine.description:
*Deploy:*
Restore {healing} Power to a damaged allied unit
card.unitSupplyWagon.name: Supply Wagon
card.unitSupplyWagon.description:
*Deploy:*
Give +{extraPower} Power to adjacent units.
Then, *Push* them {pushDistance} row forward.
card.unitArcaneElemental.name: Arcane Elemental
card.unitArcaneCrystal.name: Arcane Crystal
card.unitArcaneCrystal.description:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Generate {manaGenerated} Mana for every {chargesForMana} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will generate {potentialMana} Mana
card.unitFlameTouchCrystal.name: Flame Touch Crystal
card.unitFlameTouchCrystal.description:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Create a *Tiny Sparkling* for each *Charge* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges}
card.unitIceSkinCrystal.name: Ice Skin Crystal
card.unitIceSkinCrystal.description:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Give all adjacent allies {armorGranted} Decaying Armor for every {chargesForArmor} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will grant {potentialArmor} Decaying Armor
card.unitStoneElemental.name: Stone Elemental
card.unitStoneElemental.description:
*Deploy:* Perform an *Attack* action this turn only

*Short-Ranged Attack*: Deal {attack} Damage; Apply *Stun* for 1 turn
card.unitMerfolkStormcaller.name: Merfolk Stormcaller
card.unitMerfolkEnchantress.name: Merfolk Enchantress
card.unitCrystalMiner.name: Crystal Miner
card.unitOracleApprentice.name: Oracle Apprentice
card.unitOracleApprentice.description:
*Deploy:*
Look at the top card of any deck
card.unitLoneLooter.name: Lone Looter
card.unitLoneLooter.description: Whenever you apply a *Status effect* to an enemy unit, *Summon* one {name} from your deck.
card.unitMasterSwordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
card.unitMasterSwordsmith.description:
*Deploy:*
Give +{bonusPower} Power to all unit cards in your hand.
card.unitTinySparkling.name: Tiny Sparkling
card.unitShadowspawn.name: Shadowspawn
card.unitVolatileCrystal.name: Volatile Crystal
card.unitVolatileCrystal.description:
*Deathrattle:*
Deal {damage} Damage to adjacent units on the same row.
card.unitUndercityGambler.name: Undercity Gambler
card.unitUndercityGambler.description:
*Deploy:* Choose a non-temporary card in your unit hand to return into your deck.

*Draw* a card and give it +{bonusPower} Power.
card.unitWingedShieldmaiden.name: Winged Shieldmaiden
card.unitWingedShieldmaiden.description: Whenever an allied unit takes damage, move the ally back, *Play* {name} in its' place and *Draw* a card.
card.unitOceanicSeagull.name: Oceanic Seagull
card.unitOceanicSeagull.description:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* a Bronze Merfolk card from your deck.
card.unitMerchantsAssistant.name: Merchants Assistant
card.unitMerchantsAssistant.description:
*Deploy:*
Next spell you cast this round costs {spellDiscount} Mana less.
card.tokenPlayerDeck.name: Your deck
card.tokenOpponentDeck.name: Your opponent's deck
card.spellLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
card.spellLightningStorm.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to {targetCount} enemy units.Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit. Repeat this {targetCount} times.

Number of targets increases by {targetsPerStorm} for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.spellEnchantedStorm.name: Enchanted Storm
card.spellEnchantedStorm.description:
Give +{buffPower} Power to {targetCount} allied units.Give +{buffPower} Power to an allied unit. Repeat this {targetCount} times.

Bonus Power increases by {powerPerStorm} for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.spellHealingRain.name: Healing Rain
card.spellHealingRain.description:
Restore {healing} Power to all allied units.

Healing increases by {healingPerStorm} for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.spellSteelSpark.name: Steel Spark
card.spellSteelSpark.description:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {sideDamage} Damage to adjacent units on the same row.
card.spellAnEncouragement.name: An Encouragement
card.spellAnEncouragement.description:
*Leader Power*

Choose an allied unit. Next turn, it gains {bonusPower} Power.
card.spellFireball.name: Fireball
card.spellFireball.description:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {areaDamage} Damage to all adjacent units.
card.spellFieryEntrance.name: Fiery Entrance
card.spellFieryEntrance.description:
*Leader Power*

*Summon* a top card from your deck.
card.spellShadowSpark.name: Shadow Spark
card.spellShadowSpark.description:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Spawn a *Shadowspawn* on your front row.
card.spellNightmareDrain.name: Living Nightmare
card.spellNightmareDrain.description:
*Leader Power*

Choose a damaged unit.

Spawn a *Shadowspawn* on your front row. It gains bonus Power equal to Power the target misses.
card.spellCrystalBarrage.name: Crystal Barrage
card.spellCrystalBarrage.description:
*Leader Power*

Choose an enemy row.

Spawn *Volatile Crystals* around every unit on this row.
card.spellShadowArmy.name: Army of Shadows
card.spellShadowArmy.description:
*Leader Power*

*Create* a copy of an allied unit. If it has {powerThreshold} Power or less, repeat this effect.

This value decreases by {thresholdDecrease} after every copy.
card.spellFlamingSpark.name: Flaming Spark
card.spellFlamingSpark.description:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deals {damagePerWeave} extra Damage per stack of *Weave*
card.spellFlameweave.name: Flameweave
buff.buffBurning.name: Burning
buff.buffBurning.description: This card takes damage every turn.
buff.buffDecayingArmor.name: Decaying Armor
buff.buffDecayingArmor.description: Extra armor that decays over time.
buff.buffImmunity.name: Immunity
buff.buffImmunity.description: This card is immune to damage and any effects.
buff.buffSparksExtraDamage.name: Extra Spark Damage
buff.buffSpellDiscountAura.name: Spell Discount Aura
buff.buffSpellDiscountAura.description: Whenever you draw a spell, apply Spell Discount to it.
buff.buffSpellDiscountSingular.name: Spell Discount
buff.buffSpellDiscountSingular.descripti: This spell costs 1 Mana less for every stack of this buff.
buff.buffStrength.name: Strength
buff.buffStrength.description: This card has 1 extra Power for every stack of this buff.
buff.buffStun.name: Stun
buff.buffStun.description: This card is stunned and is temporarily disabled.
buff.buffTutoredCard.name: Temporary Card
buff.buffTutoredCard.description: This card can be played for free. It will be discarded at the end of the turn if not played.
buff.buffUpgradedStorms.name: Upgraded Storms
buff.buffVelElleronEncouragement.name: An Encouragement
buff.buffVelElleronEncouragement.descrip: This card will receive bonus Power at the start of next turn.
